Actions.Text: HELD FOR CONSIDERATION IN HIGHER EDUCATION

Title: Establishes the nursing education expansion program; appropriation
Summary: Establishes the nursing education expansion program, including faculty development program, capital facility program and the recruitment and promotion program; creates regents nursing shortage scholarships; provides for county matching awards for professional education in nursing; establishes the "nursing faculty development program fund", the "nursing capital facilities program fund", the "recruitment and promotion program fund", and the "county match awards for professional education in nursing fund"; appropriates $25,620,000 therefor.
LawCode: Add §209-u, Exec L; amd §605, add §606-a, Ed L; add §§99-ff - 99-ii, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the education law, in relation to establishing the nursing education expansion program; to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the "nursing faculty development program fund", the "nursing capital facilities program fund", the "recruitment and promotion program fund", and the "county match awards for professional education in nursing fund"; making an appropriation therefor; and providing for the repeal of certain provisions upon expiration thereof
